data.title: "Echos Through Time" - Son Goku/Genjo Sanzo [Saiyuki]
data.meta_description: Title: Echos Through Time Pairing: Son Goku and Genjo Sanzo Author: Iapetus on ff.net (aka iapetusneume) Spoilers: Episodes 1-26 of Gensomaden (anime), volumes 1-6 of Gensomaden (manga), Saiyuki Gaiden (all current released chapters) Warnings: The pairing consists of two men, so if slash/shounen…
data.text:
LJ Communities

blondes_n_sarus

sanzoxgoku

Fan Fiction Sites

Monkey Love - The largest selection of quality Sanzo and Goku fan fiction on the internet that I am aware of. It features all variations within the pairing as well as all ratings. HIGHLY recommended.

Tarnished Gold - The FanFiction.net C2 community devoted to them. It is a selective archive, and per regulations of FanFiction.net only features stories up to the R level.

Individual Stories

( Note: I did my best away from stories containing explicit sexual content, but there are two stories below that I believe are an exception to this rule due to how Sanzo and Goku are portrayed in the stories. This, by no means, does not mean that smut for Sanzo and Goku hasn't been done well and in character, but the two stories containing it below showcase their feelings in how I was trying to address them in this essay.

Also, there are two stories below that are my own. I believe that showing how I personally write Sanzo and Goku together would help explain some of the finer points of my essay. )

Awakenings by stitcher2ficcer

Amid sleepless nights and trying days, Goku comes of age and throws the relationships of the Sanzo-ikkou into chaos. PG-13

(Also Test of Rain, R)

Bashert by Iapetus

There is no greater peace than finally being with the one you love - and realizing that they love you back. And while physical touch is nice, it's the emotion behind it that means so much more. PG-13

Fade to Black by D-chan

After Gyumaoh's defeat Sanzo finds himself plagued by dreams and nightmares even more than he realizes. PG-13

(Also Breathe Again, R)

Good Enough by iamzuul

Sanzo's in the bath, and he's not washing up. NC-17 WARNING.

Last Christmas by Iapetus

AU. Sometimes what a person really wants for Christmas is not theirs to ask for. NC-17 WARNING.

Rebellion by D-chan

Because Sanzo wasn't ready for Goku to grow up. PG-13

Soliloquium by Pervasive Threnody

There is nothing inherently remarkable about the sight of Sanzo at his morning repast; Goku has seen it umpteen times already, since being brought to this place. But today, he watches with new eyes. G

The Honeymoon by Hth

Deep down, Sanzo has a heart. We're reasonably sure. R

Ticklish by Diva Urd

Goku's thoughts during a certain procedure in Reload Ep. 20... involving a paintbrush. No real spoilers for the end of Reload. PG-13

Undone by Neko-chan -Silvered Tongue-

Sanzo refuses to admit any type of weakness--and Goku tells him that it's okay to admit a weakness sometimes. PG

Winter of Our Discontent by Hallucination

Sanzo struggles to accept the presence of others in his life, and the changes that they bring. PG

::Fin::
